Title: Establishes the New York state commission to end mass incarceration and to prevent violence
Summary: Establishes the New York state commission to end mass incarceration and to prevent violence; provides such commission shall investigate, evaluate and make recommendations concerning how to reduce the New York prison population, incidences of violent crime in New York state, and other various topics related to the criminal justice system.
ActClause: AN ACT establishing the New York state commission to end mass incarceration and to prevent violence
